heading: Tonight
text: Mostly clear with passing clouds. Lows from 5 to 10 below, topping out near 0 in the south. Light northeast wind.

heading: Sunday
text: Sunshine with mixed clouds. Highs in the teens, a few 20s in the southern valleys. North wind near 10 mph, occasional gusts at 15 to 20 mph.

heading: Sunday Night
text: Mostly clear, with some high clouds through NH. Lows from near zero to 5 below. Northwest wind near 10 mph, gusting 15 to 20 mph over higher elevations.
